meanings.definition: The position or status of a god.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the character achieved godship and became a deity.
meanings.sent2: The ancient temple was built to honor the godship of the deity.
meanings.sent3: The villagers joked that achieving godship meant never having to wait in line.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and wisdom gave her an aura of godship among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The godship of the king was unquestioned by his loyal subjects.

meanings.definition: The qualities or attributes of a god.
meanings.sent1: The statue perfectly captured the godship of the deity with its serene expression.
meanings.sent2: The godship of the goddess was evident in her beauty and grace.
meanings.sent3: His friends playfully teased him about his godship in video games.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting seemed to radiate the godship of nature itself.
meanings.sent5: The godship of the hero was evident in his bravery and selflessness.

meanings.definition: The power or authority of a god.
meanings.sent1: The godship of the ruler was unquestioned by the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact was said to hold the godship of the gods themselves.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick made it seem like he had the godship to control time.
meanings.sent4: The godship of the storm was evident in its destructive force.
meanings.sent5: The godship of the sun brought light and warmth to the land.
